title: WikiYou.org
description: A site powered by sitegen as a community driven static site for anything you can think of.

title: P2P File Sharing
description: A peer to peer file sharing web app that is a wikiyou page. Allows you to share any files directly to anybody you share your share url with.

title: flickrsmartsync
description: flickrsmartsync is a tool you can use to easily sync up or down your photos in a drive/folder to flickr since now it has a free 1TB storage you can probably sync all your photo collection.
